mapper.select: select * from artclecollect inner join article on articlecollect.articleId = article.id where userId = #{id}
select * from competitioncollect inner join competition on competitioncollect.competitionId = competition.id where userId = #{id}
mapper.update: update `user` set nickname = #{nickname}, sex=#{sex}, school=#{school}, major=#{major}, grade=#{grade}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}
